targets.expr: min(min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)

sum(max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)
sum by(container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu"}) by (container)

sum by(container) (node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"} / on(cluster, namespace, pod, container) kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu"})
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu"}) by (container)

sum by(container) (node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"} / on(cluster, namespace, pod, container) kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu"})
sum by(container, name) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))

# if container didn't run at some interval, you will have division by zero, so we do ` / increase + epsilon`
max by (container, name) (
  (increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]) )
/
  (increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod",container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-5 )
)
max by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
max by (container, name) (last_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", resource="memory"}[$__range]))

max by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range])) / on(container) group_left last_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", resource="memory"}[$__range])
max by (container, name) (last_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", resource="memory"}[$__range]))

max by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", image!=""}[$__range])) / on(container) group_left last_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", resource="memory"}[$__range])
max by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
max by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_cache{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
max by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_swap{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
max by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_max_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
max by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))

options.content:
- `RSS` is memory allocated explicitly
- `RSS` + Active   cache -> `WSS`
- `WSS` + Inactive cache -> `Raw` memory usage
- Formula: Cache = Active + Inactive
- Cache is active if it used _often_ (more than once?)
- RSS and cache are exact values
- `Raw` is kernel approximation used for cache flushing and OOM killer
- `WSS` is roughly `Raw` - Inactive cache

What to look for:
- WSS reaching limit causes file garbage collection
- RSS reaching limit causes OOM kill

targets.expr: max by (container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container", invalid=$enableLimits})

max by (container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container", invalid=$enableLimits})
max by (container, name) (max_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", container=~"$container", image!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

max by (container, name) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", container=~"$container", image!=""}[$__rate_interval]))
max by (container, name) (max_over_time(container_memory_max_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", container=~"$container", image!=""}[$__rate_interval]))
max by (container, name) (max_over_time(container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", container=~"$container", image!=""}[$__rate_interval]))
max by (container, name)(max_over_time(container_memory_cache{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
max by (container, name)(max_over_time(container_memory_mapped_file{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) by (interface)
sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) by (interface)
sum(rate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) by (interface)
sum(rate(container_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) by (interface)
sum by(container, device) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{container!="", container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container, device) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container, device) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{container!="", container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container, device) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container, device) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container, device) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

options.content:
Read/write from NFS and SMB shares
will not be shown in the storage throughput.

Cadvisor exports data from cgroup io.stats,
which are only calculated for block devices.

targets.expr: sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
